## isNumeric() function

Check to see if the provided parameter is a number.

"2" or 2 will return true.

Source [https://stackoverflow.com/a/42356340/1349766](https://stackoverflow.com/a/42356340/1349766)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isNumeric(num: any): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  num | any | The value to check if it is numeric |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

True if the value is numeric.
